page.title: 17MUSIC INTERVIEW
page.content: 1. NAME:{REVEREND JOHN WILMOT. 2. INSTRUMENTS:{ORGAN AND PIANO. 3. FAVOURITE MUSIC:{JOHN STANLEY_ { TRUMPET TUNE. MENDELSSOHN_ { SONG WITHOUT WORDS NO.14 4. WHEN AND WHERE DO YOU PLAY:{ORGAN { AT CHURCH AND THE PIANO AT HOME.} 5. YOUR FAVOURITE MUSIC:{CLASSICAL 6. YOUR FAVOURITE INSTRUMENT:{ORGAN. 7. WHEN WERE YOU BORN:{1922 8. WHEN DID YOU START MUSIC:{1932 9. YOUR FIRST INSTRUMENT:{ORGAN. 10.DOES ANYBODY IN YOUR FAMILY PLAY AN INSTRUMENT AND WHAT IS IT:{ { WIFE & SISTER_PIANO & ORGAN. { ELDEST SON_ ORGAN & GUITAR. { YOUNGEST SON_ TRUMPET CORNET & { TROMBONE. { DAUGHTER_ PIANO, ORGAN & GUITAR I PLAYED THE BIGGEST CHURCH ORGAN IN THE COUNTRY AT LIVERPOOL CATHEDRAL. I LIKE PLAYING GRAMOPHONE RECORDS.
